talk.author: did:plc:2bwpuvajjzvulpy7opxnzuw6
talk.utter: But none of that is ✨because✨ of Trump.

talk.author: did:plc:abjtfzklggbhbd36rlacrr5u
talk.utter: Oh, trust me, I know. But most people unfortunately aren't very critical thinkers when it comes to the economy (or much of anything really). They vote based on vibes. It's extremely frustrating.

talk.author: did:plc:2bwpuvajjzvulpy7opxnzuw6
talk.utter: Is the American experiment doomed because someone decided that 4 year Presidential terms are best and economic impact of policies have a delay that feeds into this election outcome hell we’re currently in?

talk.author: did:plc:2bwpuvajjzvulpy7opxnzuw6
talk.utter: That’s not happening. That is NOT the plan with Trump. Trump is planning on crashing the economy, gutting the government, defunding the government, starting trade wars and THEN after what could easily be a decade of carnage he wants the free market to bring manufacturing back to America. LOL, no.

talk.author: did:plc:3rpck3mptpei3h62xaia4niu
talk.utter: I'm not defending Trump's tarrifs, hes making them for his own game. I'm defending the desire for increased tariffs in the midwest. They should be written to the benefit of the working class.

talk.author: did:plc:if7se2obrbnlmu6bp4grvri5
talk.utter: Not helpful - let's not turn this place into xitter already.

talk.author: did:plc:2bwpuvajjzvulpy7opxnzuw6
talk.utter: We don’t have to put up with pretending Trump is “going to save us actually” like get fucking real.
